name: Clown RPG 2! [DEMO]
description:
Since my first RPG maker project, Clown RPG, was so successful, I decided to make a better one! Play as a team of rebels, rebelling against their evil clown overlords.

You are sent on a mission to collect five crystals of immense power to use to take revenge on the clown regime. 

Featuring the default RPG maker assets, PLUS super high quality* custom enemy and item sprites

 

If this beautiful creature doesn't make you want to install my game (NOT A VIRUS) and recommend it to 10 of your friends**, I don't know what will.

*Quality of artwork may vary

**Failing to recommend the game to 10 friends may cause the creature to become displeased. I am not liable for any violent behavior the creature exhibits toward you while in an upset state.
